original_text: Moreover, we have all had human fathers who disciplined us and we respected them for it. How much more should we submit to the Father of spirits and live!
korean_text: 또 우리 육신의 아버지가 우리를 징계하여도 공경하였거든 하물며 모든 영의 아버지께 더욱 복종하며 살려 하지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Moreover, we have all had human fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 더욱이, 우리 모두에게는 인간 아버지가 있었고

sentences.original_text: and we respected them for it
How much more should we submit
sentences.korean_translation: 하물며 우리가 얼마나 더 복종해야 합니까
